00014         {

00016                 global $assertions_failed;

00029         {
00030                 $expression = get_class($expr);
00031                 assert_options(ASSERT_CALLBACK, create_function('$file, $line, $code',
00032                         "echo \"{$description}; expecting ($class) but found ($expression)\n" .
00033                         //"File '\$file', Line '\$line', Code '\$code'\n" .
00034                         '";'));
